name: twineedle
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in the same turn. Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
short_effect: Hits twice in the same turn. Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Stingers on the forelegs jab the foe twice.
flavor_text.emerald: Stingers on the forelegs jab the foe twice.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is stabbed twice with foreleg stingers. It may poison the foe.
